amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for the Department of Housing and Urban Development Housing Counseling Assistance Program by $10 million and to reduce funds for the Department of Housing and Urban Development operations and management account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the salaries and expenses for the Department of Housing and Urban Development by $10 million and increase the funds available for Housing Counselor Programs by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 218 (Roll no. 419).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 218 (Roll no. 419).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mrs. Capps.
